title: Gold + team lf ad and sup!
body:
Our schedule will be most afternoons and we will have a coach. I'm looking for people who want to take development seriously and be open about talking about the game and going from there.
If you are interested please fill out the application posted below and I will get back to you by either adding you or telling you declined on your comment thread on the post so you know you've been looked over.
DO NOT ADD ME ADDING ME WILL RESULT IN IMMIEDIATE DECLINE
Tryouts will start today.
App:
IGN:
OP.gg Link:
Role:
Rank:
Champ pool:
Why do you want to join:
Strengths:
Weaknesses:
Why do we benefit from choosing you:

replies.body:
IGN: Instinct AsMatt

OP.gg Link:  http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Instinct%20AsMatt

Role:Adc!

Rank: Gold 4

Champ pool: Ezreal, Varus, cait, vayne, pretty much any meta champ i'll learn

Why do you want to join: Been looking for a good team that's organized 

Strengths: Laning, and team fight positions, also communication 

Weaknesses: I only play at night, sometimes i go Ham too much.

Why do we benefit from choosing you: Mature, ready to play, want to compete, WANT TO WIN. Also, i have a duo i play with, we are currently 15/2 in soloq atm. You can get us both and make it easy, His IGN is Rank Two

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=ranktwo

His Op.gg

Good day Legacy.

App: i assume this means to fill out the application.

IGN: irima

Op.gg Link: http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=irima

Role: Support pref, Adc secondary. I've mained ADC however i play support at roughly the same level, and I'm more interested in the support position, if 
interested i can elaborate in tryouts.

Rank: Plat 5 season 7, peaked p4. just finished promos and placed silver 2.

Champ Pool: Support: (Rakan, Poppy, Thresh, Braum.)      Adc: Jinx, Xayah, Twitch, Trist. I am open and quick to expanding my champ pool if necessary these are just my best.

I want to join because: i'm interested in developing as a player in a team environment and helping others improve to improve the success of the team. it's my goal to become a top tier player my hope is that this will be a positive growth experience.

Strengths: Shot calling, Macro understanding, Drive to improve, Aggressive mechanics, lane dominance with coordinated duo partner, kind to other players. willing to take responsibility and learn from my calls. Generally good at seeing engaging opportunities.

Weaknesses: Tilting, Occasional over Aggression, expect a lot of effort from teammates, tunnel visioning, variability of mood causing high and low peaks of play.  Moderate in relation to platinum skill level at most micro concepts like: csing, positioning, and reaction speed.

you benefit from choosing me because: i thrive in team environment's due to my aggressive play style and proactive macro and engagement calls. Secondly but most importantly, i believe the drive i bring to improve myself and the team i believe is my most valuable asset i bring to the team environment assuming we are like minded in our goals for improvement. 

lastly i would like to note, that my account is border-less due to a 2 week ban i got from jokingly saying "keywords" in a normal game 2 months before the season ended (i was actually joking around when i got this penalty). However, I wont deny that i have been toxic in the past due to an inability to express my feelings of frustration in an appropriate manner. I don't mind talking more in-depth about this if you are interested however, i have no interest in being toxic or blaming others anymore, my only goal is to improve.


thanks for the time, have a nice day. -Irima.

App: ?
IGN: Limited Skill
OP.gg Link: http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Limited%20Skill
Role: ADC
Rank: Mid Gold (gold 3 atm)
Champ pool: Draven, Xayah, Trist, Kog, Cait, Twitch, Vayne (can pick up Jinx, Ez, Jhin, Varus)
Why do you want to join: Want to join a team
Strengths: Draven
Weaknesses: Macro
Why do we benefit from choosing you: DRAAAVEN {{champion:119}}

replies.poster: T I L T B O I
replies.body:
Hmm...guessing your adc and supp from last week already quit

probably not related to your attitude

good luck!

So far no one has made it past the tryout phase. we don't care about skill just following instruction and in game following up on calls. that's why you were declined man. you didn't make it past the very first part of the tryout. Following instructions on the app. its not about being elitist or better than anyone else we are just holding a standard. If you want to keep shitting on me talk to the coach who told me to do this you can add him if you want. was no hard feeling against you.

replies.poster: T I L T B O I
replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=OMNI Legacy,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=AjnoFKtz,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-02-25T00:32:55.935+0000)
>
> So far no one has made it past the tryout phase. we don't care about skill just following instruction and in game following up on calls. that's why you were declined man. you didn't make it past the very first part of the tryout. Following instructions on the app. its not about being elitist or better than anyone else we are just holding a standard. If you want to keep shitting on me talk to the coach who told me to do this you can add him if you want. was no hard feeling against you.

you're demanding people post op.gg when it's legit attached to the icon that appears on all posts

the game is about fun, I have a job where you have to follow all instructions perfectly, I didn't come here to pretend i'm back on the oil rig while playing a video game

just throwing it out there, your attitude is going to vet almost all players away from your team and you'll be left with people who are desperate as opposed to those who can actually help you

i'd have been glad to help you but the anal retentiveness of denying someone over a link that is actually technically on the post makes me realize my life would be miserable on this team

Clearly wouldn't be a good fit then would it? Lol why do you feel the need to continue to post on my shit and make me conform to what you think a team should be and how I should act when you have literally no part of the team?? Makes no sense dude. sounds like youre just defensive for getting declined

IGN: Volcano Bunny 
OP.gg Link:http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Volcano%20Bunny
Role:ADC
Rank:Gold1
Champ pool: Trist, Varus, Kog EZ pretty much all ads with a few games ahah
Why do you want to join: I improve better with teams and i enjoy playing with 5 
Strengths: Shotcalling and teamfighting 
Weaknesses: still need to work on winning lane harder 
Why do we benefit from choosing you: Im good at giving information i have lots of time to grind :D

IGN: Very Fkn Tilted
OP.gg Link: OP.gg Link:
Role: Support
Rank: Unranked right now. Gold V on this account last season. Plat 5 on main account.
Champ pool: Thresh, Janna, Lulu, Nami, Morgana, Taric, Alistar, Bard, Blitzcrank, and Soraka
Why do you want to join: Trying to improve and hit diamond this season
Strengths: Good in lane. Knows when to play safe and when to be agressive. Know how to help farm under turret. Vision play very good.
Weaknesses: Sometimes play too safe. Mechanics not where I would like it.
Why do we benefit from choosing you: You get a good support that keeps good vision and a safe lane.

App: Not sure what this means.
IGN: Mulldin33
OP.gg Link: http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=mulldin33
Role: ADC / MID
Rank: Plat 5 Peaked Plat 1 on main account
Champ pool: Jinx Varus Kat Anivia Tristana Twitch Vladimir...
Why do you want to join: Looking to improve and work on weaknesses
Strengths: knowledgeable about the game, Funny, mechanically awesome at the game :)
Weaknesses: Troubles with positioning... fixing this thought, also trouble with aggression also working on this though.
Why do we benefit from choosing you: Not having to find a antisocial, not willing to improve player.
